name: News Aggregator
description: Aggregates latest news from multiple sources using newspaper3k, supporting parallel processing and category-based filtering
author: Shinkai

language.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Affects article parsing. Default: en

number_threads.description: Parallel processing threads (1-20). Higher values speed up scraping. Default: 10

request_timeout.description: HTTP request timeout in seconds (5-60). Increase for slow sources. Default: 30

max_concurrent_sources.description: Max parallel source processing (1-10). Higher values use more memory. Default: 5

items.description: Valid HTTP/HTTPS URL to news website homepage. Must be accessible without login

providers.description: Array of news website URLs to scrape. Each URL must be valid and publicly accessible

articles_per_source.description: Max articles to fetch per source (1-50). Higher values take longer. Default: 5

items.description: Article category filter: general (all), tech (technology), or business

categories.description: Filter articles by categories. Uses built-in sources if no providers specified

total_sources_processed.description: Count of successfully processed news sources out of total attempted sources

total_articles_found.description: Total articles found and processed across all successful sources

title.description: Article headline text as extracted from the news source

url.description: Direct URL to original article on news website

source.description: Domain name or identifier of the news source website

summary.description: Auto-generated brief summary of article content

publish_date.description: Article publication date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD[T]HH:mm:ss[Z])

items.description: Name of article author as listed on the news source

top_image.description: URL to main article image. May be null if no image found

text.description: Full article text content with formatting removed
